original_title: Kiss [1977] Live at Cobo Hall Detroit
overview: With three sold out nights at Detroit's Cobo Hall KISS repeated a three night stand from a year earlier, this time on the ROCK AND ROLL OVER Tour.  Recorded live at Cobo Hall, Detroit, MI, January 29, 1977 - the third night.
title: Kiss [1977] Live at Cobo Hall Detroit
